t: Marshal*pn your troops now, city of troops, for*ld a siege is laid against us. They*ln will strike Israel’s ruler on*ld the cheek with a rod.

“But*pn you, Bethlehem Ephrathah, though*ld you are small among the clans of Judah, out*ln of you will come for me one*ld who will be ruler over Israel, whose*ln origins are from of old, from*ld ancient times.”
Therefore*pn Israel will be abandoned until*ld the time when she who is in labor bears a son, and*ln the rest of his brothers return to*ld join the Israelites.

He*pn will stand and shepherd his flock in*ld the strength of the Lord,*s in*ld the majesty of the name of the Lord*s his God. And*ln they will live securely, for then his greatness will*ld reach to the ends of the earth.
And*pn he will be our peace when*ld the Assyrians invade our land and*ld march through our fortresses. We*ln will raise against them seven shepherds, even*ld eight commanders,
who*ln will rule the land of Assyria with the sword, the*ld land of Nimrod with drawn sword. He*ln will deliver us from the Assyrians when*ld they invade our land and*ld march across our borders.
The*pn remnant of Jacob will be in*ld the midst of many peoples like*ln dew from the Lord,*s like*ld showers on the grass, which*ln do not wait for anyone or*ld depend on man.

The*ln remnant of Jacob will be among the nations, in*ld the midst of many peoples, like*ln a lion among the beasts of the forest, like*ld a young lion among flocks of sheep, which*ln mauls and mangles as it goes, and*ld no one can rescue.
Your*ln hand will be lifted up in triumph over your enemies, and*ld all your foes will be destroyed.
“In*p that day,” declares the Lord,*s “I*pn will destroy your horses from among you and*ld demolish your chariots.
I*ln will destroy the cities of your land and*ld tear down all your strongholds.
I*ln will destroy your witchcraft and*ld you will no longer cast spells.
I*ln will destroy your idols and*ld your sacred stones from among you; you*ln will no longer bow down to*ld the work of your hands.
I*ln will uproot from among you your Asherah poles when*ld I demolish your cities.
I*ln will take vengeance in anger and wrath on*ld the nations that have not obeyed me.”
